AbilityDef.label: acid burst
AbilityDef.description:
Emit a burst of acid in all directions that corrodes anything it touches.

This will also kick up a dust cloud that may buy this super some time to heal themselves and plan their next move.

This ability utilizes code created in Alpha Genes, and all credit for said code belongs to them.

AbilityDef.label: foam burst
AbilityDef.description:
Emit a burst of foam in all directions that removes fires and protects all pawns in the area from catching fire. This protection will only prevent the pawn from catching fire, and doesn't do anything against fire damage itself.

 This will also kick up a dust cloud that may buy this super some time to get a fallen ally out of the area.

This ability utilizes code created in Alpha Genes, and all credit for said code belongs to them.
